page.title: 13ENTERTAINMENTS
page.content: Survey of Entertainments in Skipton area as advertized in{The Craven {Herald}&{Pioneer}Vol. 46 No. 997{ {10-5-85 SHOWS {Otley show}(Otley) CHARITIES {Jumble Sale}(Airton Chapel Scholl Room) DISCO & DANCES {Old Time Dance}(Bradley village Hall) THEATRE {Skipton Players Little Theatre (Clifford street Skipton) PLACES TO VISIT IN SKIPTON {Skipton Castle}(Top of town) CINEMAS {Regal 1 & 2 }(Keighley Road Skipton) {Plaza }(Sackville Street Skipton) COFFEE MORNING {Craven Collage }(High Street Skipton)
